text:
-9-
January 68 - Young woman, 23, B.A., desires position in ETV. Much
experience acting, directing, stage managing, designing and scenery
gained in college and summer theater. Wishes position as assistant
director, production assistant or designer. Single* Location open.
$75/wk.
January 69 - Ph.D. in audio-visual education, writer-producer of early
ETV series, commercial film story editor, also experienced in film-TV
crew, teaching and acting, desires position in any combination of writing-
producing, teaching or related film work. Male, married, 37. Location
open. $4800.
January 70 - Station manager of large ETV station desires position as
producer-director or in administration. An idea man thoroughly experienced
in radio-TV, 8 years teaching experience, award-winning specialist in
low budget production. Male, married, 39, M..S. Location open. $7500.
January 71 - Science and math high school teacher desires ETV position.
Has completed classwork at Stanford on Ed .D. with emphasis on science
education through TV. Can write, has worked on floor of commercial
stations and produced educational shows. Male, 37, married, M.E.
Location open .$5000.
January 72 - Experienced manager, now assistant director at college ETV
station, desires more challenging position. Wishes college-level teaching,
manager or assistant director of ETV station. Male, 37, married, Ph.D.
Location open, $6000.
January 73 - TV producer-director with 2 1/2 years experience in ETV,
desires new position. Has had experience in children’s programs,
modern dance, panel, quiz, news and other informational programs - with
and without scripts . Creative, yet attentive to details . Prefers to find
position in the South, but wiil go anywhere. Male, married, 32, B.S.
$5500-6500.
January 74 - Male, 31, married, B.S., is now production manager at
Midwest ETV station, desires move to new location so he can finish his
M.A. in English. Can be producer-director as well as production mana¬
ger. Will teach. Has 3 1/2 years commercial TV training, 7 years in
radio. Locate on either coast or Great Lakes area. $6000.
January 75 - Producer-director at commercial TV station desires switch
to ETV. Much technical experience - permanently responsible for 5
regular shows. Male, 29, married. Schooled in Germany and U.S.
Location open. $4500-5000.
